ualberta.g12.adventurecreator.controllers

Interface SController

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    StoryController

    public interface SController
    Controller class for modifying a SModel Object. Any class that modifies an modifies an extension of SModel should implement this class.
    Provides method stubs for modifying a SModel object.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addFragment(Story s, Fragment f)
      Adds a fragment to the story's list of fragments.
      void setAuthor(Story s, String newAuthor)
      Sets the author of the given story.
      void setFragmentAtLocation(Story s, int Pos, Fragment f)
      Sets the given fragment at the given position in the given story.
      void setTitle(Story s, String newTitle)
      Sets the title of the given story.

    • Method Detail

      • setTitle

        void setTitle(Story s,
            String newTitle)
        Sets the title of the given story. This will automatically update the id of the story as the id is created from the title and author of the story.
        If a null value is given, the story's id will be set to an invalid id.
        Parameters:
        s - the Story to change the title of
        newTitle - the new title of story s

      • setAuthor

        void setAuthor(Story s,
             String newAuthor)
        Sets the author of the given story. This will automatically update the id of the story as the id is created from the title and author of the story.
        If a null value is given, the story's id will be set to an invalid id.
        Parameters:
        s - the Story to change the author of
        newAuthor - the new author of Story s
        s - the story to change the author of

      • addFragment

        void addFragment(Story s,
               Fragment f)
        Adds a fragment to the story's list of fragments. Behavior is unspecified if either the story of fragment are null.
        Parameters:
        s - the story to add a fragment to
        f - the list of fragments so a new one can be added

      • setFragmentAtLocation

        void setFragmentAtLocation(Story s,
                         int Pos,
                         Fragment f)
        Sets the given fragment at the given position in the given story. Behavior is unknown if no fragment exists at this position.
        Parameters:
        s - is the story where the fragment is contained
        Pos - is the Position of the fragment inside the story
        f - is the new fragment we wish to set at Pos
